=====================
Pronouns: ko / mi'o / ma'a

ko klama

(source_file (statement (sumti (ko)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

mi'o klama
---
(source_file (statement (sumti (mio)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

ma'a klama

(source_file (statement (sumti (maa)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
